name: Boston Pizza
address: 2850 Bentall St, Vancouver, BC V5M 4H4, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Perogy
hasMenuItem.description: Sour cream, bacon, Cactus Cut Potatoes, pizza mozzarella, cheddar, green onions and a dollop of sour cream.

hasMenuItem.name: Wings - Single Order
hasMenuItem.description: Our most popular starter. Choose among oven-roasted, fried and boneless all-meat wings. Tossed in your choice of sauce and served with fresh veggies and a dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Cactus Cut Potatoes
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy and thinly sliced fried potatoes served with our signature cactus dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Bandera Pizza Bread
hasMenuItem.description: Pizza bread, Italian spices, pizza mozzarella and freshly grated Parmesan. Served with Santa Fe ranch dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Create Your Own Pasta
hasMenuItem.description: Choose your pasta, your sauce and customize it with our favourite toppings!

hasMenuItem.name: Mac & Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Macaroni noodles tossed in a super cheesy cream sauce made with cheddar, provolone, Gouda, mozzarella, and Parmesan cheese. We then top it with more cheese, and panko breadcrumbs, and bake it until golden brown. Served with garlic toast.

hasMenuItem.name: The Triple Play
hasMenuItem.description: A shareable portion of three guest favourites: Bandera Bread with Santa Fe Ranch dip, our Signature Chicken Thai Bites, and Cactus Cut Potatoes served with cactus dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Wing Combo
hasMenuItem.description: A starter size of your favourite wings and a side of your choice.  Served with fresh veggies and a dip.

hasMenuItem.name: French Onion Soup
hasMenuItem.description: A rich beef broth made with sherry and sweet onions. Topped with house-made crostini, Gouda, provolone, pizza mozzarella, and Parmesan, then baked until the cheese is a bubbly golden brown.

hasMenuItem.name: Smoky Mountain Spaghetti Meatballs
hasMenuItem.description: A mountainous serving of spaghetti smothered in Bolognese sauce, then topped with three meatballs and cheddar cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Create Your Own Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Customize your own pizza. Add your favorite toppings to our original pizza crust with our signature pizza sauce and pizza mozzarella.

hasMenuItem.name: Seven Cheese Ravioli
hasMenuItem.description: Ravioli stuffed with Parmesan, Emmental, ricotta, fontina, and Romano, baked with pizza mozzarella and cheddar, and your choice of sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Shrimp Fettuccini
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy garlic and chili shrimp with roasted red peppers, tomatoes, and fettuccini in a spicy marinara sauce. Finished with Parmesan and served with garlic toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Braised Beef Mac  & Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Tender slow-cooked beef with sauteed mushrooms, balsamic-roasted red onions, and elbow noodles in a creamy, cheesy sauce. Topped with panko breadcrumbs and a blend of mozzarella, cheddar, and Parmesan cheeses. Served with garlic toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Rib & Wing Duo
hasMenuItem.description: Half a rack of our slow-cooked pork back ribs and five oven-roasted chicken wings glazed or tossed in your choice of sauce. Served with fries, coleslaw and garlic toast. Try it with our NEW holiday cranberry BBQ sauce!

hasMenuItem.name: Tour of Italy
hasMenuItem.description: Buttermilk-breaded fried chicken breast topped with our signature alfredo sauce, Gouda, Provolone, pizza mozzarella, and Parmesan cheese. Served over beds of spaghetti marinara and fettuccini in a basil cream sauce, with garlic toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Pomegranate Glazed Salmon
hasMenuItem.description: A salmon filet oven roasted and glazed with our sweet and savory pomegranate glaze. Served over quinoa and brown rice with sauteed spinach and roasted sweet potatoes. Finished with sesame seeds.

hasMenuItem.name: Caramel Pecan Sticky Toffee Pudding
hasMenuItem.description: A decadent sticky toffee pudding served warm with gooey caramel and candied pecans. *Not served with ice cream for takeout and delivery.

hasMenuItem.name: Cranberry Brie Dip
hasMenuItem.description: A warm, cheesy dip featuring brie, cream cheese, pizza mozzarella, cranberries, Italian herbs, topped with candied pecans and a drizzle of honey. Served with Parmesan and basil pizza bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Sweet & Smoky Ravioli
hasMenuItem.description: Tender cheese filled ravioli, tossed in a garlic cream sauce with smoky bacon, roasted sweet potatoes, balsamic-roasted red onions, spinach, and four Italian cheeses. Served with garlic toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Kim Crawford Sauvignon Blanc
hasMenuItem.description: Kim Crawford Sauvignon Blanc, 750 ml Bottle. TAKE OUT / DELIVERY ONLY. (13% ABV)

hasMenuItem.name: 4Pk Pick and Mix Beer
hasMenuItem.description: 4-pack domestic beer - mix and match 4x355ml Cans. Choose from Coors Light, Molson Canadian, Budweiser and Bud Light. Must be legal drinking age. Terms and Conditions apply. Take-out and Delivery only.

hasMenuItem.name: Jackson-Triggs Merlot 750mL
hasMenuItem.description: Jackson-Triggs Merlot, 750 mL Bottle. TAKE OUT / DELIVERY ONLY. (14.5% ABV)

hasMenuItem.name: Jackson-Triggs Chardonnay
hasMenuItem.description: Jackson-Triggs Chardonnay, 750 mL Bottle. TAKE OUT / DELIVERY ONLY. (12% ABV)

hasMenuItem.name: White Claw Black Cherry
hasMenuItem.description: White Claw Black Cherry, 355ml Can. Available in Singles, and 6-packs. TAKE OUT / DELIVERY ONLY. (5% ABV)

hasMenuItem.name: White Claw Natural Lime
hasMenuItem.description: White Claw Natural Lime, 355ml Can. Available in Singles, and 6-packs. TAKE OUT / DELIVERY ONLY. (5% ABV)

hasMenuItem.name: Kokanee
hasMenuItem.description: Kokanee, 355 mL Can. Available in Singles, and 6-packs. TAKE OUT / DELIVERY ONLY. (5.2% ABV)

hasMenuItem.name: Bud Light
hasMenuItem.description: Bud Light, 355 mL Can. Available in Singles, and 6-packs. TAKE OUT / DELIVERY ONLY. (4% ABV)

hasMenuItem.name: Heineken
hasMenuItem.description: Heineken, 355 mL Can. Available in Singles, and 6-packs. TAKE OUT / DELIVERY ONLY. (5% ABV)

hasMenuItem.name: White Claw Mango
hasMenuItem.description: White Claw Mango, 355ml Can. Available in Singles, and 6-packs. TAKE OUT / DELIVERY ONLY. (5% ABV)

hasMenuItem.name: Molson Canadian
hasMenuItem.description: Molson Canadian, 355 mL Can. Available in Singles, and 6-packs. TAKE OUT / DELIVERY ONLY. (5% ABV)

hasMenuItem.name: Coors Light
hasMenuItem.description: Coors Light, 355 mL Can. Available in Singles, and 6-packs. TAKE OUT / DELIVERY ONLY. (4% ABV)

hasMenuItem.name: Jacob's Creek Moscato
hasMenuItem.description: Jacob Creek Moscato, 750ml Bottle. TAKE OUT / DELIVERY ONLY. (8% ABV)

hasMenuItem.name: Smirnoff Ice
hasMenuItem.description: Smirnoff Ice, 355 mL Can. Available in Singles, and 6-packs. TAKE OUT / DELIVERY ONLY. (5% ABV)

hasMenuItem.name: Budweiser
hasMenuItem.description: Budweiser, 355 mL Can. Available in Singles, and 6-packs. TAKE OUT / DELIVERY ONLY. (5% ABV)

hasMenuItem.name: The Triple Play
hasMenuItem.description: A shareable portion of three guest favourites: Bandera Bread with Santa Fe Ranch dip, our Signature Chicken Thai Bites, and Cactus Cut Potatoes served with cactus dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Wings - Single Order
hasMenuItem.description: Our most popular starter. Choose among oven-roasted, fried and boneless all-meat wings. Tossed in your choice of sauce and served with fresh veggies and a dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Wing Combo
hasMenuItem.description: A starter size of your favourite wings and a side of your choice.  Served with fresh veggies and a dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Cactus Cut Potatoes
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy and thinly sliced fried potatoes served with our signature cactus dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Bandera Pizza Bread
hasMenuItem.description: Pizza bread, Italian spices, pizza mozzarella and freshly grated Parmesan. Served with Santa Fe ranch dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Wings - Double Order
hasMenuItem.description: Our most popular starter. Choose among oven-roasted, fried and boneless all-meat wings. Tossed in your choice of sauce and served with fresh veggies and a dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Classic Nachos (Starter Size)
hasMenuItem.description: Hand-cut tortilla chips topped with cheddar, pizza mozzarella, green peppers, olives, jalapeño peppers, tomatoes, and green onions. Served with salsa, sour cream, and your choice of protein.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Fingers
hasMenuItem.description: Original or Buffalo style. Lightly breaded chicken breast filet served with your choice of dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Boston's Pizza Bread
hasMenuItem.description: Pizza dough baked and seasoned with garlic, herbs and Parmesan.

hasMenuItem.name: Spinach & Artichoke Dip
hasMenuItem.description: Spinach, artichokes, roasted garlic, pizza mozzarella, Cajun seasoning, tomatoes, feta, and Parmesan. Served with pizza bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Thai Bites
hasMenuItem.description: Breaded chicken breast tossed in sweet Thai chili sauce and served with crunchy Asian noodles, carrots, green onions, and sesame seeds.

hasMenuItem.name: French Onion Soup
hasMenuItem.description: A rich beef broth made with sherry and sweet onions. Topped with house-made crostini, Gouda, provolone, pizza mozzarella, and Parmesan, then baked until the cheese is a bubbly golden brown.

hasMenuItem.name: Deep Fried Pickle Wedges
hasMenuItem.description: Dill pickle spears lightly fried and served with buttermilk ranch dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Crispy Cajun Shrimp
hasMenuItem.description: Breaded jalapeño shrimp, fried and then tossed in our Cajun dry rub. Served with a sweet and spicy mango dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Garlic Parmesan Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Take your fries to the next level. Golden fries tossed with garlic and Parmesan cheese. Served with our signature cactus dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Onion Rings
hasMenuItem.description: Panko-crusted onion rings, served with house-made honey dill dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Quesadillas
hasMenuItem.description: A stack of mini quesadillas packed with pizza mozzarella, cheddar cheese, fire-roasted corn, onions and peppers, ancho chipotle sauce, fresh tomatoes, and green onions. Served with salsa and sour cream.

hasMenuItem.name: Quesadillas Combo
hasMenuItem.description: A stack of mini quesadillas packed with pizza mozzarella, cheddar cheese, fire-roasted corn, onions and peppers, ancho chipotle sauce, fresh tomatoes, and green onions. Served with salsa and sour cream and a side of your choice.

hasMenuItem.name: Create Your Own Pasta
hasMenuItem.description: Choose your pasta, your sauce and customize it with our favourite toppings!

hasMenuItem.name: Smoky Mountain Spaghetti Meatballs
hasMenuItem.description: A mountainous serving of spaghetti smothered in Bolognese sauce, then topped with three meatballs and cheddar cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Mac & Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Macaroni noodles tossed in a super cheesy cream sauce made with cheddar, provolone, Gouda, mozzarella, and Parmesan cheese. We then top it with more cheese, and panko breadcrumbs, and bake it until golden brown. Served with garlic toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Boston's Lasagna
hasMenuItem.description: Our beefy Bolognese sauce layered over tender noodles, topped with pizza mozzarella, then baked to perfection and finished with fresh Parmesan.

hasMenuItem.name: Seven Cheese Ravioli
hasMenuItem.description: Ravioli stuffed with Parmesan, Emmental, ricotta, fontina, and Romano, baked with pizza mozzarella and cheddar, and your choice of sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Mushroom Fettuccini
hasMenuItem.description: Grilled chicken breast, mushrooms, tomatoes and green onions, with Alfredo sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Buffalo Chicken Mac & Cheese
hasMenuItem.description:
Cheesy Buffalo Alfredo sauce tossed with red peppers and 
macaroni noodles, topped with cheese and panko breadcrumbs. Then baked until golden brown, and finished with crispy Buffalo chicken bites, green onions, and Parmesan cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: The Hungry Carnivore
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy Italian sausage, meatballs, pepperoni, mushrooms, roasted red peppers, and green peppers, tossed with penne and our beefy Bolognese. Finished with freshly grated parmesan and parsley. Served with bacon-crusted garlic cheese bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Parmesan Shrimp Alfredo
hasMenuItem.description: Garlic sautéed shrimp tossed with spaghetti in a parmesan white wine Alfredo sauce with seasoned spinach and cherry tomatoes. Finished with freshly grated Parmesan and a zest of lime.

hasMenuItem.name: Jambalaya Fettuccini
hasMenuItem.description: Chicken breast, shrimp, spicy Italian sausage, tomatoes, green peppers, green onions, Cajun seasoning and marinara sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Creamy Mushroom Spinach Bake
hasMenuItem.description: Baby spinach, mushrooms, and penne tossed in a garlic pesto cream sauce. Baked with Gouda, provolone, pizza mozzarella and Parmesan cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Perogy
hasMenuItem.description: Sour cream, bacon, Cactus Cut Potatoes, pizza mozzarella, cheddar, green onions and a dollop of sour cream.

hasMenuItem.name: Pepperoni
hasMenuItem.description: Signature pizza sauce, pizza mozzarella and loads of pepperoni.

hasMenuItem.name: Mediterranean
hasMenuItem.description: Signature pizza sauce, pizza mozzarella, fresh spinach, mushrooms, olives, red onion, and feta, topped with fresh tomatoes and a pesto drizzle.

hasMenuItem.name: Great White North
hasMenuItem.description: Signature pizza sauce, pizza mozzarella, cheddar and smoked ham.

hasMenuItem.name: Loaded Pepperoni & Bacon Squarefooter™ Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Square pizza topped with pepperoni, pizza mozzarella, bacon, cheddar, and a classic pizza sauce drizzle.

hasMenuItem.name: Meateor
hasMenuItem.description: Beefy Bolognese sauce, pizza mozzarella, smoked ham, pepperoni, seasoned ground beef and spicy Italian sausage.

hasMenuItem.name: Hawaiian
hasMenuItem.description: Signature pizza sauce, pizza mozzarella, pineapple, and smoked ham

hasMenuItem.name: Royal Hawaiian
hasMenuItem.description: Sweet Thai honey garlic, Gouda, provolone, Parmesan, pizza mozzarella, red onions, smoked prosciutto, bacon, pineapple, and toasted sesame seeds.

hasMenuItem.name: Bourbon BBQ Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: House-made Bourbon BBQ sauce, bacon, BBQ chicken, balsamic-roasted red onions, pizza mozzarella and cheddar cheese. Finished with a buttermilk ranch drizzle.

hasMenuItem.name: Deluxe
hasMenuItem.description: Signature pizza sauce, pizza mozzarella, pepperoni, smoked ham, green peppers and fresh mushrooms.

hasMenuItem.name: Boston Royal
hasMenuItem.description: Signature pizza sauce, pizza mozzarella, smoked ham, pepperoni, shrimp, olives, green peppers, onions and fresh mushrooms.

hasMenuItem.name: Buffalo Chicken Squarefooter™ Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Square pizza topped with pizza mozzarella, spicy Buffalo chicken, and red onions. Finished with green onions, and drizzles of Buffalo hot sauce and buttermilk ranch.

hasMenuItem.name: The Carbonara Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Hand-pressed pizza dough smothered in garlic butter and topped with loads of cheese, grilled chicken, smoky bacon, Alfredo sauce, and Parmesan.

hasMenuItem.name: Tropical Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Alfredo sauce, pizza mozzarella, cheddar, bacon, spicy chicken breast and pineapple.

hasMenuItem.name: Sweet & Savory Italian Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Hand-pressed pizza dough, Tobasco sriracha pizza sauce, Genoa salami, pizza mozzarella, pesto, and goat cheese, topped with a honey drizzle.

hasMenuItem.name: Vegetarian
hasMenuItem.description: New recipe: Signature pizza sauce, pizza mozzarella, mushrooms, green peppers and red onions, pizza spices and fresh diced tomatoes.

hasMenuItem.name: Halftime Squarefooter™
hasMenuItem.description: Get your appetizer and pizza all-in-one. Our all-NEW NY Sicilian Squarefooter™ Pizza is half Bandera Bread and half a “Create Your Own” 2-Topping Pizza loaded edge to edge, on our soft and airy dough with a crispy garlic crust. Served with Sante Fe ranch dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Create Your Own Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Customize your own pizza. Add your favorite toppings to our original pizza crust with our signature pizza sauce and pizza mozzarella.

hasMenuItem.name: 8'' Individual Cauliflower Crust Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Cauliflower crust pizza with our signature pizza sauce and your choice of cheese. Available for 8 individual pizzas only with a maximum of four toppings, priced accordingly.

hasMenuItem.name: Tacos
hasMenuItem.description: Three soft tacos with your choice of protein, creamy lime-coleslaw, pizza mozzarella, tomatoes, ancho chipotle sauce, and cilantro.

hasMenuItem.name: Boston-Sized Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Two-grilled quarter-pound patties, topped with cheddar, lettuce, tomatoes, red onions, pickles, and our signature cactus dip, on a brioche bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Maple Bacon Burger
hasMenuItem.description: A quarter-pound beef patty, grilled and glazed with maple BBQ sauce. Topped with cheddar, candied maple bacon, lettuce, tomatoes, red onions, pickles, and mayo on a toasted brioche bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Honey Dill Chicken Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: A buttermilk-fried chicken breast, topped with house-made honey-dill sauce, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and pickles, on a toasted brioche bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Boston Brute
hasMenuItem.description: Genoa salami, pepperoni, smoked ham, pizza mozzarella, onions, and our signature pizza sauce. Served with beefy Bolognese sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Thai Chicken Wrap
hasMenuItem.description: A grilled flour tortilla, chicken breast, lettuce, red onions, carrots, cilantro, mayo and crunchy Asian noodles, tossed in our Thai chili sauce. Served with your choice of side.

hasMenuItem.name: Kick'n Memphis Chicken Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Buttermilk-breaded fried chicken tossed in Memphis hot sauce, cheddar, bacon, ranch dressing, lettuce, tomatoes and a pickle on a brioche bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Grilled Chicken Clubhouse
hasMenuItem.description: Garlic cheese baked baguette layered with chicken breast, bacon, lettuce and fresh tomato, drizzled with our secret sauce.

review.reviewBody: Excellent as always and we will order here again.
The bread is completely burnedd and inedible.
Pizza was a bit overcooked but still was okay
I ordered mashed potatoes and gravy, substituted for the fries with the Chicken Finger Combo, and did not receive the gravy. Otherwise the pizza and chicken was delicious!
